decision_conditions: The revised  proposals to include a basement level and associated works would fall outside the original description of development as approved under planning permission 23/02227/FUL. The description of  the original development cannot be lawfully changed by way of a Section 73 application as set out in the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

In the absence of a Basement Impact Assessment and submission of inconsistent technical scheme drawings,  it has not been demonstrated how the proposed basement would be constructed and be suitably flood resistant and resilient such that it would not pose a safety risk to future occupants in a flood event, nor that it would not cause or exacerbate surface water flooding to neighbouring properties,  contrary to Policy D11(C) of the London Plan (2021), Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012) and Paragraph 181 of the NPPF (2024).
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 8 (garage/car parking) for Application Reference Number: 23/02227/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of a replacement dwelling.) dated 23/12/2024. Variation to move the secure parking to an underground basement level to provide two secure enclosed parking spaces.
